categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: A male lieutenant served in the Galactic Empire's garrison on the manufacturing planet Sullust during the Galactic Civil War. In 3 ABY, the lieutenant briefed some stormtroopers at the garrison on the Sullustan resistance, a Rebel Alliance cell active in Sullust's capital city. They were then interrupted when news arrived of an attack on the Inyusu Tor mineral processing facility.
The Imperial lieutenant appeared in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
